content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were returning from a wedding at the gilston house in east haddam, ct leaving at about 10:30 on the evening of april 11th, 2009. it was cold and overcast because it had been raining all day. we were driving south on route 154 between exits 7 and 9 of route 9 which runs parallel to 154.

we noticed a large, bright, orange colored globe over the connecticut river to our left down in the trees below the horizon. it was pumpkin orange, a perfect verticle circle, thick, paper like in texture with  solidarity and sharply defined edges. it had a uniform luminescent hue to it.   

it was not the moon.

we continued to observe it on our left for about 10 minutes as we followed the road turning right then up a hill, down a hill and up to where the road leveled off for quite a ways. the globe now seemed to be moving west-northwest on top of the hill, thru the trees, towards us. 

i thought about stopping and taking a picture several times with my cell phone but didn't because there was an ominous feeling to it. we both felt that. i don't exactly remember loosing sight of it. we just seemed to arrive at the intersection of 154 and i-95, 30 miles later. 

as we turned west on i-95, the sky was clear and the moon was further off to the west, yellowish white and high in the sky. we talked about what we experienced. the solidarity of the verticle circle, it's texture, sharp edge, illuminescent quality to it, the total lack of any sound and the ominous tone to the whole experience. how slowly and yet how quickly it moved thru the trees. and i mean thru the trees. 

when we arrived in clinton, ct a little after 12:30, the yellow-white moon was in it's normal place almost overhead and we were glad the day was coming to an end. but it struck me odd that it took 2 hours to cover a 1 hour drive.  

we have no idea what we saw but checking the mufon site the following week i saw reports of a simular object being seem in westerly, r.I., bristol, ct and litchfield, ct. all aparently in the same evening.

could this be the 4th sighting of the same object on the same day? 
going in the same direction for over 100 miles?

all this tells me something unusual occurred that night.
what ever it was was definitely not the moon.

but what was it?

it bothers me.
so that is why i'm reporting it.
content.summary: Bright orange globe seen over the connecticut river down in leafless trees below the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking pictures of the sky, did not see anything while taking the pictures, only when i loaded the pictures on the computer for a closer look!    object seems to be travling from  left to right, north to south...   you can see in both pictures, i shot both pictures side by side only 1 second apart if that....   object seems to be traveling at a high rate of speed...  at night time in berlin nj, i have been seeing alot of activity in the sky of bright lights moving at high speeds... this was moving way to fast, left to right, and floating, then stop, no sound at all..
content.summary: Did not see the object while taking photo

content.detailedDescription: Not certain if this is the proer venue to report this-my apologies if not. i was up, unable to sleep, around 430am on june 12, 2009, and was up and on the computer. we live on a wooded 4.5 acre lot in thornville, oh. my neighbors yard is a cleared lawn that transitions into woods like ours, and as i looked over to their yard, out my office window (it was very dark near my house, but their porch light illuminated their lawn very well)i saw a "human-like" invisible creature appear out of nowhere in the middle of the lawn and walk very rapidly (faster than a human could walk-it looked as if someone was rolling a tape in fast-motion)for about 15-20 steps, maybe a distance of 30 feet, then it just disappearred. i could see through the being as it was invisible, however, i could definately tell something was there. the best way i can describe it is that it was like the alien in the "predator" movie w/arnold schwartzenegger(sp?)when it was invisible in the jungle. my first thought was-are my eyes playing tricks on me? so i blinked and moved my head side-to-side by the window wondering if the window screen had caused me to see something, trying to recreate the sighting to no avail. being that all the windows in the house were open and it was very dark right next to my house-i got very spooked and ran to my room and jumped in bed next to my husband.
content.summary: Invisible (like in predator movie) creature sighting

content.detailedDescription:
It was the day we left florida, november 7, 2008. i got off work at about 5:30pm, and the movers had already come and gone with our stuff. once i did, we jumped in the car and literally took off immediately, eager to hit the open road.

we plowed through the west palm beach traffic, passed jupiter and were in the clear out of palm beach county, heading north on i-95. it was about 7:30 by now and dusk was strongly enveloping the east coast.

as we neared the daytona beach exit, it was close to 9:00pm. all traces of daylight were gone, and it was a clear night of about 72 degrees. i happened to glance to my right, in the direction of the ocean, when i noticed what appeared at first to be a shooting star. i was going to say something to my wife, but figured by the time i said anything it would be gone.

the seconds ticked by as i watched in amazement. 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 seconds.... by now i yelled to my wife "look at that shooting star!" she said she saw it and we both watched, me with both eyes, my wife with one on the road and one on the sky. i never took my eyes off the strange burning light as it seared it's way southwards, directly over the ocean. then the most amazing thing happened -- it slowed down and eventually stopped, hovering directly over the ocean right between daytona and cape canaveral. it was at least 30 miles or more out over the atlantic by my estimation.

my wife saw this phenomena as well, and we both yelled "whoa!" at the same time. by now we thought maybe it was a comet, but then something even more amazing happened: the fireball started to head down towards the earth! jen was starting to swerve a little, and looked away to correct the car in the right lane. we watched as the ball of light then split into 5 or 6 separate pieces! each piece started to go in it's own direction, all headed more or less towards earth. next, all the separate fireballs paused and hung suspended in mid-air, maybe as low as 5,000 feet above the earth. i judge their height based on the fact that there was a commercial airliner flying high overhead at the time, and if it was at 30,000 feet or so, i placed it about 6 times higher than the fireballs.

we were very excited! this seemed like something that could not be explained typically. i have a strong scientific and skeptical background, and this was something that could easily be dismissed. i've seen meteors, comets, space stations with telescopes, thousands of planes and helicopters flying at night, balloons, etc., and none of them moved liked this or glowed with such ferocious intensity. and we really got excited when we saw it split into 5 or 6 pieces. it was an exhilarating experience and one we are glad to have shared.

i just wish i had photos or videos of the event, or that someone else on florida's east coast had seen the same thing. if you know of any video of this event, please share so i can compare it with what we also saw.

we almost pulled off the highway to investigate, but had gotten such a late start on the road trip we decided to press on, noting the time and location so i could look it up online later. i watched the floating 5 balls until we were totally out of sight. to my knowledge they never moved.

later, my extensive internet research revealed nothing regarding the event.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw glowing balls hovering at 5,000 feet, then splitting into 5 seperate balls.

content.detailedDescription:
I just discovered your organization today in an article in the virginian pilot newspaper.  just thought you might like to see this image while it is still on google streetview.  i attended a funeral service at 1801 baltic avenue, virginia beach, va yesterday, july 8th 2009.  prior to going i used google maps to find the facility.  if you spin the streetview tool to the southeast and look over the portico you will see an interesting object.

there is a naval air station nearby.  i flew out of there myself for many years.  so there are many possibilies, but the object does not appear to be a jet, helicopter, or even a blimp.  other possibilities include a banner being towed along the beach.  i ruled out a streetlight, because they can all be accounted for in the images.  i can't determine the date the image was taken.

bill miller
content.summary: Unknown object caught on google streetview.

content.detailedDescription: You know the first part, now let me tell you that this object made no noise such as a jet or propeller driven plane, its flight path was from west to east, there were very few scattered clouds and the sun was setting at the time.It moved a little eradically not in a straight line,and slowly.I would guess it to be just above the clouds too.I have seen these before,i decided that i should all make these sightings known.They are real!!!Do you think mankind has evolved far enough to handle the truth? i do!!! all mankind has to do is learn to live in peace, that would be the first step to knowing more about them.Ok, so much for my thoughts, i watched it slowly fade from sight to the east.
content.summary: I walked out of my back door,looked up and saw this object moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside watching the sky when from the northeast i caught site of a formation of lights, about as bright as a dim star, i initially thought was a triangle type ufo but noticed that the lights were not in a perfect equilateral triangle and there were 4 of them.

they were extremely high altitude, i'm guessing higher than a jet liner and moved smoothly without breaking formation in a straight path maybe 2 or 3 times faster than a commercial jet.

the lights never broke formation and i lost them when the disappeared over the tree in my back yard.  i actually jumped the fence and ran down the road to see if i could get a better view, but i lost them.

i truly can not tell if these were multiple objects at a far distance or one large single craft closer up.  the sky was clear with a haze on the horizon.

when i first caught site of these they were almost directly over my head, i would say at about an 80 to 85 degree angle.  i only saw them for maybe 5 or 6 seconds.  

the color was very similar to a dimly lit dull red star.

there was absolutely no sound but as soon as i lost it over the trees a commercial jet came from the west flying to the east.  i'm curious if the pilots saw anything.

i drew a picture of their arrangement and approximate color.
content.summary: Triangle formation of 5 or 6 solid lights like a dimly lit star flew from the northeast to the southwest

content.detailedDescription:
Due to the recent events in boca raton, this is the details of what i saw about 20 years ago near the same area ('bout 20 miles away)... but there's more after the green orb story.

about 18-20 years ago, i seen something similar by the pbi airport. my girlfreind at the time and i were visiting a freind that lived in them houses behind the landing strip bar. we were walking around outside and saw exactly what these folks (in boca) say happened, except it didn't stay for 2 hours. it was only in the sky for about 5 minutes when we watched it. it was a green orb, it hovered for a minute or so and then it zig zagged across the sky and shot away. no kiddin'. we told our much older freinds and they just laughed it off. they told us it could have been a deflating balloon or something. this isn't the only time strange things like that have occured here in pbc, i've even tried to get ufo specialists to come and investigate, but nothing ever come of it. if this is a hoax, it has been going on for a very long time. and it usually starts right around and during hurricane season. 

there was no sound smell or reflection, after awhile i told myself it could have been pockets of jet fuel. (gases)

during hurricane andrew, i had another weird few encounters. i was staying in a quanson hut for protection against the hurricane in palm beach gardens fla, and i heard and saw weird things during the storm.

so much happened that night i'll just give you the skinny.

)i heard things outside my door walking around
)i saw something looking in through the metal door hole. 
)i found a scorched symbol on the inside of the quanson hut, i had never seen before, it was two rounded corner triangles inside one another that were inside two circles, and between the triangles and circles there were 2 lines of several lines that looked like some kind of writing.
)i also found some strange rocks... probably meteorites or something,(same property) but they looked like a rocks and were hard. until you put a flame to it, then it crumbled like dust where the heat was applied. it was kind of silvery inside.

anyways, i told my freinds about it, they asked if i had weird dreams, and i did, so they told me to contact someone. and i did. but i forgot who, some world renowned ufo investigator at the time, and we corresponded up to the point where he asked. "are you sure it was a ufo?"

and well, since i wasn't really sure, i had to say no and go one about my business without ever really understanding any of it all.

then recently when i saw them kids in the news in boca, i was speculative, but when i saw what they described and what it did, i was stunned. because over time i was sure what i saw years ago was a fluke of nature or something, that is until this happened.

if i didn't have a witness with me the night i saw the green orb, we wouldn't be talking right now, because she saw it too. we have long departed ways and i have no clue where she's at, but if she see's this story, she might say something.

i think i reported this to another site, along with other strange things, i'll see if i can hunt down what i put up there... i'm pretty sure it was a little more detailed than what this report has in it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Green orb near palm beach international airport (this is actullay 2 reports)

content.detailedDescription: i was looking sw and setting in a lawn chair smoking and looking at the stars when i saw a jet with red, green, and strobe lights flying ne,wedo not have a security light so it is pretty dark at night. i have reported a light before,coming from nw to se. i have also seen another light earlier, about april or may it came from the wnw from between the last two stars of the handle of the big dipper going in a straight line to the ssw.  i thoght it was a satellite, then it went behind the milky way which was straight over my head and never come out. i was looking out my back door. the light i saw on the 7th was different. when i looked away from the plane and looked back and noticed a real bright yellowish white light flying to the ne also but, the light was a little to the south and behind the plane to the sw. i watched for a few minutes and thought the plane and light were about the same altitude then noticed the light go behind some clouds i did not see the plane go behind the clouds. when i turn around to look to the ne i noticed another light even higher and it appeared to be smaller and a different color futher to the se. i did not see that light very long by the time i noticed it, the plane and bright light were getting futher away. i did not see what direction the little light came from, but all three of them were going in what seemed to be a straight lines to the ne. after they flew futher away to the
content.summary: Bright yellish white light by aircraft second light show up .

content.detailedDescription: I was standing by my window to get some fresh air when i noticed and object with a flashing red light.  at first i thought it was a plane flying by since planes frequently fly by my area.  what caught my attention was that it was moving slower and in the wrong direction.  as i was watching, the plane quickly changed directions.  it created a sort of zig zag pattern before taking off in the direction that it came.  i am confused as to what it was so i thought i would post it to see if anyone else saw it and could tell me what it was.
content.summary: Flashing red lights abrupt direction change

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving a fireworks show in henderson nv. i decided to open my sunroof. there to my amazement was a auburn, almost fire-like light traveling from southwest to the northeast horizon. it lasted about 45 seconds.  it looked like it was moving slow. i know it was really high so the traveling speed was fast and big. it gradually disappeared  in the horizon. 

believe it or not, this is the second sighting like this i've seen. i seen the same in alot bigger scale about 20 years ago in san jose ca. it was alot slower and huge! immediately we tuned to  kgo radio. they were swamped with calls. kgo decided to call moffit field navel base (which also housed nasa). they actually went on the air and said that it was a metallic object that burned up in the  earths atmosphere. the military actually knew about it. it was seen in 12 states. hmmmm.
content.summary: A slow moving auburn light flying from southwest to northeast

content.detailedDescription: Was outside my residence star gazing when i noticed a light traveling ne. it appeared high up and i thought it was a plane as i am in the landing pattern for one of the chicago airports. i spotted it with the binoculars and noticed it was brighter then normal landing lights. as it got closer i noticed it was above the normal landing high and the light was much brighter then normal. as it flew directly over head you tell the light surrounded the object and it was not a commercial aircraft. it continued on its path to the ne until it was out of sight.
content.summary: Very bright light traveling slowley ne

content.detailedDescription:
Just outside of my residence, i was having a chat with my friend over a cigarette, ana when we looked at the sky just to watch the clouds passing by, we saw a green line with a length of two air planes.

it stayed there for almost 3 hours and after that clouds kicked in and blocked the view, and when the clouds passed on, the gree lighted line was gone, i can explaine what that was, i tried so hard to imagine what that was, but i could not find any reasenable explanation.

now i don't believe in ufo's but i'm diying to know what was that green light in the sky.

ps: i tried to take a picture or recorded video, but it was so dark so nothing appeared on the pictures or the video.
content.summary: Green light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: At aprox. 8:50 pm mother and i were returning home from a trip, as we turned from the highway onto her lane my mother studdered do you see that???? i could see an orange/yellow glow through my windshield and i immediately knew what she was seeing (as we had a sighting together the previous year almost to the exact date and i had said to her 2 days before this that its almost that time again we'll have to watch for ufos...Jokingly). i immediately pulled my van over to the side of the road and opened my door, stepping out i looked up above me and at tree top level or a little higher was a craft. it was circular/or possibly octagon in shape...Seeing it from underneath i saw the center was a perfect circle of what i thought at the time was some type of fire..Orange/yellow in color and the yellow/orange color looked as if it was rolling or moving.I believe at that moment i was trying to rationalize what i was looking at...A hot air balloon? what? if it would have been a hot air balloon it was close enough to us i could talk to the people in the basket, but what basket, there was no basket.We both watched from outside our van almost in a trance, speechless.I never actally saw the craft from the side only from underneath, it seemed to move slowly but actually it moved quickly if that makes sense.It move up and over higher and higher. i watched for a few seconds then reached into the car for my cellphone to get a picture... i found my phone and when i got to the camera device it said memory full so i yelled for my mom to give me her phone, by the time i got it opened to the camera the craft had moved a far distance away, i managed to get 2 pictures of an orange glow. we drove a few hundred feet to my mothers home by then she had her digital camera out and snapped 2 photos which didn't come out. we stayed there until we couldn't see it anymore it got smaller and farther away. i would say we were in a high state of excitement and panic for those few minutes, in the few hours afterwards were were still in disbelief and even the next morning i said can you believe that ufo that was awesome! she lauged and said yes it was awesome i still can't believe it.We did find another person in the area that witnessed a "fireball" the same evening and aprox. same time."
content.summary: Sighting of octagon shaped object/fireball

content.detailedDescription: on the evening of july 5th i was sleeping in my bedroom when i woke up to a humming sound. at first the sound was a straight hum, but then it was followed by short beeps. the pattern would be: hum-beep-beep-beep, hum-beep-beep-beep. at first i though it was my burglar alarm. i got out of bed to check my control panel only to find out that the  noise was not coming from that location. i then walked back into my bedroom and checked my ipod. i then sat on my bed and remember thinking how bright the moon beam was coming through my window. as i turned to look out my window i saw a huge round light just hovering outside my window in the sky. the light was almost blinding, it was so bright. the beam of light that came across my bedroom was almost pure white light, and very bright.When i walked over to my window i was able to ascertain that the noise was definitely coming from this round light source. i wasn't startled or scared. after a few minutes i crawled back into bed. the noise then stopped and the light was gone. this may sound very bizarre, but as i was drifting off to sleep i heard a voice say "we have been watching you. as a matter of fact we have pictures of inside your body". it wasn't until the next evening that my girlfriend told me about hearing people on the music station cat county talking about a ufo sighting. this is whe i started to be come alarmed at what i had witnessed.
content.summary: Humming noise very bright beam of light shining through bedroom window  voices

content.detailedDescription: I looked oustside my window of my 2nd floor bathroom looked up and there it was, it looked like a balloon at first it twinkelled in the sunlight. but it was stationary. it moved slowly from the north to south east 300 feet up and a quarter a mile away over a very urbanized area until it disapeared going east slowley. i was able to get one good photo as it left the only reason a got a good shot was because it twinkelled as i took the shot. i also noticed these strange lines like airline exaust trails, and as it goes through a cloud it would leave an empty space. as i waited and examined the area a few minutes after the ufo left, these lines just appear out of no where with no aircraft of any kind flying in or around it. i dont know if this is of any significants but i thought it was something worth mentioning. i got a few good shots of it too. i also noticed what looked like military jets flying through the same area the ufo was, they were white, flying low maybe 200-300 feet high and made no sound if thats possible. i got a photo of one them too. i know what your thinking maybe the ufo was one of the jets but if you noticed in the first photo of the ufo its not moving.
content.summary: Star like, small and very high

content.detailedDescription: I was at the firework's at prestonwood country club sitting on the grass we saw the ufo moving across the sky. other people saw this and one child said are we being invadied. other yeild out what is that?
content.summary: Blue circle with light glossing moving accross the sky from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: After watching the 10pm iss fly over i was putting lawn chairs away when i noticed a low flying aicraft making aturn from swest, i noticed the lights on the craft were ina tiangular shape 2 small white lights on the rear tips and a larger red strobe on the front. it was low about 2-3 thousnd ft. and maybe 2oo mph. no sound. the event lasted 90 sec.Iwatched the last part of the sighting with binoculars and could the craft was a dark grey triangle. a bit larger than a c-130 which flew over my house and landed at cannon intr.A few mins. after triangle flew west over reno.
content.summary: Triangle low and slow over reno

content.detailedDescription: 17 y/o son and i were sitting on north-facing deck of home and saw cream white solid colored oval object moving very slowly from ssw to nne in straight line. there was no sound and no navigation or strobe lights observed. height was probably less than 3000 feet.
content.summary: White, cream-colored oval slowly moving ssw to nne,no sound, straightline.

content.detailedDescription: Facing west waiting for the fireworks to begin across the lake, when a child said 'look mommy ufo!" i turned my video camera on and observed this red sphere floating from the northwest heading south-southeast it just vanished about maybe 2 minutes afterwards.Granted with noise of fireworks, there was no sound or blinking lites on it as it was definately not aircraft.  monday the 6th, one of my passengers on my bus run told me they saw the same thing that nite over rice lake which is about 40 miles straight east. unfortunately, i am not techno savvy to get this video online.
content.summary: Red  sphere illuminated interior floated above sakakawea lake/missouri river

content.detailedDescription: this report was relayed to me(f.I.Connie mcnichols)by pete hartinger (rufos)this is taken from phone interview i had with the witness on 06/21/09. on 06/19/09 between midnight and 1:00am while driving south on rt 33 from columbus outside of lancaster when the witness noticed in the south a blue/gray illuminated light.Shaped like a oblong disc hovering 50 degrees above horizon, at unknown distance.The object was 1/4 the size of the full moon.As she approached it suddely flashed like a huge camera flash,turned right (west) and flew out of sight within seconds. total duration approximately 10 seconds.
content.summary: Blue/gray oblong disc 1/4 size of full moon was seen while driving outside lancaster

content.detailedDescription:
I have two eyewitness reports.

around 9 p.M. a friend called me to come outside.  there was a green light in the sky, but it was too close to be a star.  it was moving side-to-side and hovering, like nothing i have ever seen before.  i jumped in my car and drove to its location.  it was a green glowing diamond shaped object, about 100ft above us, floating.  we watched and took pictures as more bystanders showed up.  it slowly started to move ne.  then all of a sudden it shot 30 ft east in seconds.  it was unbelievable.  we watched it move half a block east then come to a stop.  a police officer eventually showed up and asked us what we were doing.  he saw the object also and had no idea what it was.  around this time we saw a white wire sticking out of both sides of this ufo.  i have no pictures of it though.  it eventually went very high in the sky and slowly faded away.  it was the strangest thing i have ever seen.


monday night i was driving west on sw 18th street in boca raton to pick my family up at my brother���s home in the area and i noticed a ���different��� light in the sky. what caught my eye is that the angle changed as i was driving. that���s what first increased my interest. there was a car behind me so i turned north on isabella and stopped the car. i got out of my car and observed something really incredible. after a few minutes a jogger came buy and when i pointed it out to him, he got a little freaked out. i was on the telephone with my wife at my brother���s home telling her what i was seeing. they all went outside and didn���t see anything because perhaps for the tree lines and they were about a ��� mile away. i went to pick everyone up, my wife, two daughters and my father-in-law and went back to the scene. when we returned, there were about 20 people, mostly kids in the street all on their cell phone going a little nuts. my family got out of the car not really expecting anything. that didn���t last long. about 5 minutes later, my brother showed up with his daughter, he was skeptical from the onset. when he got out of his car, the ufo was just hovering, but when it started to move, he, like everyone else started to scream. my brother is a local dentist in town and he called a colleague of his that lives in the neighborhood too, same reaction. this was a very clear night with a full moon. there were a few white clouds. one of the kids had a pair of binoculars. eric vandernoot, the astronomer at florida atlantic university has no clue. there were no sounds, no motor sounds, no weather balloon, no laser, nothing but the shape with movement that is unexplainable from any technology we have to produce such an event. the movement at times was so vast that a weather balloon would have to be miles in size and in that case you would have to see it.. this was truly a remarkable event that can not be identified. it was in the air too long to have been propelled too fast by a remote hobby aircraft, and no sound. i can see now how someone would have to explain this away as a hoax. i have better than 20/20 corrected vision, don���t drink etc, have a very technical and mechanical background and know this was way beyond a backyard hoax or even a far, far stretch for disney. 

it was also on the news: 
http://www.Wptv.Com/content/news/topstories/story/ufo-sighting-boca-raton/qpcon5vf1eikxsskw5ylpq.Cspx
content.summary: Green glowing object floating and moving erratically

content.detailedDescription: We were watching fireworks on our front porch. we then saw the orange lights that were moving in formation together very slowly across the sky coming toward us. i immediately thought ufo and went in to check the news. no new reports. like they would report it anyway. i figured if the world was ending, i was going to stay inside and get myself a beer.
content.summary: About 10 orange lights moving very slowly in formation together

content.detailedDescription: on july 4th our on duty fire crew of 4 plus one of the crews wife were on the west side of town to watch the fireworks display.  it was approx. 9pm.  we all saw a bright light to the north of us heading south. at first we thought it was a plane but quickly realized there was only one light, it was the wrong color and way to large.  as it grew closer we could see that it was actually fire and not a light.  the object continued at a fairly moderate but steady speed the entire time. the time that it was nearest to us we could see it going above low level clouds and under upper level clouds. also at this point i got our binoculars from the engine and tried to view the object.  due to a problem with the binoculars and trying to focus on an object that far away without any other objects closer to base my attempts at focus i could only see the object cleary for a second or so.  it appeared to be a very large fire ball that mostly covered the object, the upper rear portion of the fire ball had what appeared to be the edge of a square object sticking out of it.  there was no noise, vapor trail, or anything else that could be associated with the object.  it continued on its trajectory at a seemingly constant speed and altitude untill it could no longer be seen in the southern sky.  as the object passed us the fire ball seemed to dim somewhat as if it were hidden partially by the object in it, but some fire was visible until the entire object disappeared from sight.  i would estimate the entire duration to be in the 5 minute range.  i would appreciate any information you have on this.
content.summary: Fireball seen flying south over the west edge of gardner.

content.detailedDescription:
We were in plymouth waiting for the fireworks to begin when we saw the orange orb move across the sky. it did not blink or flash, did not stop, and moved at a consistent speed.

about 15 minutes later we saw it again, moving in the same direction, what appeared to be the same speed, etc... as far as we could tell it was indentical in behavior.

we only saw it those two times, both times it came into view and left without stopping.  we heard no sound from it.  it behaved exactly like a plane in the sky would have, minus the fact it was not a plane.

we did snap a photo of it, although all you can see is just an orange ball.  hardly anything conclussive.
content.summary: Orange orb moving in a straight line

content.detailedDescription:
Was home in greatroom which is glass mostly on 3 sides. watching tv, i glanced to my right and saw really bright, pulsing light, round in shape, through patio door over the valley in front of south side of house.  it was like the color of a dimmed down halogen light, but more white when it pulsed brighter.  it headed east coming from the west.  totally silent.  had left my good hd camcorder at river house, so i grabbed daughter's cheap sony handycam and shot video of it, which would have been longer had it not been for the dvd loading stuff.

it seemed to be round with a flat side and rotating--same as our sighting on may 18, 2009 here (pics are already on mufon.Com). that sighting was a much bigger sized thing than this.  i estimate this one to be only about 10 feet in diameter--although purely a guess, as the distance and other factors were hard to gauge because of the light.

on july 8, 2009 at 4:07 am another one more orange in color came from wnw sky heading to se sky into the trees also. perhaps the color appears darker the further away you are. our sighting on may 13th was a darker colored orange and was higher up overhead also.

i went and got my good hd camcorder and waited in farm field across the street from my house and at 10:00:11 pm another bright one higher up appeared overhead silently and headed one tick above east.  it was steady lit until it started descending into the tree line, at which time it began to pulse like the night before.

here are some blown up stills of it--the color perhaps is a blend of all the colors shown together to get the orange or dirty yellow color-- the video is posted to my youtube channel name:  seeingufospa 
channel name of nimitta1 has video of the same thing too (by altoona, pa) 
the video from the 8th will follow  soon.

the orange ones seem to be an epidemic lately all over the world--wonder when the powers that be will address their presence?
content.summary: Murrysville:  orange/yellow orb flew w to e low altitude-same kind as 5/18/09 one

content.detailedDescription: I was outside speaking with the neighbor and having a smoke.  i first noticed a red glow far off in the distance south of me.  i at first thought it must have beel a plane banking or something because there's lots of air traffic around here.  i kept chatting with my neighbor and after a few minutes i noticed it was still in the same general area and still only red.  so i started watching it while we kept talking.  i noticed it wasen't flashing but it was pulsing.  i was able to tell it was moving very slow. i started thinking of what it could be. i've seen plenty of satelites and this was moving much much slower and pulsing red. so i kinda thought that was out.  no blue or white and it wasen't flashing like a plane either so planes were out.  same with the helios around here.  i had my camera in my pocket so i pulled it out and snapped a couple of shots and shot a couple of videos.  all still talking to my neighbor.  then i asked him to take a look and he said that it was kinda strange also.  he sat back down and we continued to talk.  it kept moving slowly to the north.  at one point i thought it had stopped but i think that was because i was watching it on me camera screen.  finally when it dissappeared it faded like the space station does.  it just dimmed out and was gone.  the whole sighting lasted better than 25 minutes.  i got 6 minutes on digital video.  my camera isin't very good quality in the dark like that but it turned out better then i expected it would.  the first snap shot was distorted because i flinched a bit when i took it and the other isin't very clear for some reason but the videos make out better.  i thought afterwards that it moved kind of like a ballon would have.  attach a pulsing red light to a ballon and let it go.  that might do it but the way it faded diden't seem to fit.  i diden't catch the moment that i lost it because i coulden't hold the camera on it any more and i shut it off.  it was kind of fun watching it.  i don't know what it was.
content.summary: Red pulsing light moved very slowly accross the sky

content.detailedDescription: We saw 7 white/silver things on the 4th of july at 3:50 pm, in clear sunny southern california skies, while swimming in the pool.  i spotted 3 white/silver shiny objects first.  i observed them for a minute or so, and thought that they were just balloons.  then i noticed that they were not floating up or drifting like a balloon would.  the 3 objects were staying the same distance from each other and not being blown around by the wind.  they moved back and forth for 20 seconds or so against the wind and sometimes would stay in the same spot for a few moments. i���m guessing they were 3000 or more feet up.  i showed the family what i was looking up at and they watched them too.  my son pointed out that there were 4 more white/silver objects over there in the east.  all 7 of the things stayed the same distance from each other while we all watched them for about fifteen minutes.  my wife said that they were probably just balloons.  my son said that they were definitely not balloons, he pointed out how they were not moving with the wind, and they were staying in the same formation from each other and the surface did not look like balloons.  they looked kind of like bright stars in the daytime.  when i first spotted them they would have been over the seal beach weapons station.  all 7 of them eventually moved west towards the 405 freeway and golden west street and disappeared from our view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7 white/silver things on the 4th of july huntington beach california

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting poolside in newport beach last sunday after dinner. i noticed a very bright object in the sky just hovering.  it looked like a star which would glow very bright then dim slightly. it was about north east. 
 i think it was just a mylar ballon, but it was not really moving in a direction. we watched it for about an hour and the light emitted from it didnt change.  i took a few pictures and increased the object to 400% and one off them looks like a disk. 

ive attached the pictures, im sure its explainable. 
the object is a small dot above the palm.
ted

you can contact me thru email
content.summary: It was a bright object, star like and hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Right after my wife and i were married, we moved into a large victorian house that had been converted into two one-bedroom apartments and two efficiency
apartments. we had made friends with the couple who lived below us, who had just finished a stint with the stateside peace corps called vista. the husband had taken a summer job as a ticket collector and guide at the uss north carolina battleship memorial on the cape fear river. during the summer months the battleship memorial would present a nightly sound and light show. it was this event for which my friend was hired. on the night in question, my wife and i were visiting the wife of my friend while he was at work. sometime between 7:00 pm and 8:00 pm, my friend called his wife, ecstatic about a small light he was observing in the sky. he urged us to go outside and look straight up into the sky, because some of the people in the bleachers at the battleship memorial were also observing the ufo. we walked out to the sidewalk on s. third street and looked straight up at the zenith. we finally spotted the object moving erratically in the sky, a small white dot that was able to cross the entire sky in a matter of seconds or fly very slowly. it could also come to a dead stop, hover a few seconds, and then shoot off in an entirely different direction, often at a 90 degree angle to its original flight path. i now estimate this object to have been at about 30,000' altitude. we watched this object for about 15-20 minutes. it was and remains one of the most exciting nights of my life.
content.summary: Small white dot
